item.title: Birdbox 2021
item.description: Watch YouTube Video I wanted to try doing a Raspberry Pi project, so I got myself a Raspberry Pi Zero W (but Pi Zero 2 is better for this), a NOIR camera, a Bright Pi, a power bank, and a power cable. And then I put it all together, put my 16GB memory card into my computer, and installed Motion Eye OS following this guide: Guide by Arrow.com After following that guide, just put your Raspberry Pi in a birdbox and you’re all set.
